definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traditional Chinese medicine slimming capsule of the role of weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方中藥減肥膠囊的減肥作用。

sentences.english: Objective To establish quality standard for Compound Zhuanggu Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立複方壯骨膠囊質量標準。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the curative effect of compound Anisodine injection treating ocular fundus disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討複方樟柳鹼注射液治療眼底病療效。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a method for microbial limit tests of compound Huaimi capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立複方槐米膠囊微生物限度檢查方法。

sentences.english: Compound anisodine injection clinical application in ophthalmology, quite a number of reports.
sentences.chinese: 複方樟柳鹼注射液在眼科的臨牀應用已有不少報道。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Injectio Salviae Miltiorrhizae Composita, as add-on treatment of bronchiolitis of newborn, has a good efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 結論複方丹蔘輔佐治療新生兒毛細支氣管炎療效明顯。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the total flavonoids contents in Complex Prescription Kudouzi Granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定複方苦豆子顆粒中總生黃酮含量的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of different extraction parts from Xiongjiang Decoction (XD) on promoting uterine muscle contraction (UMC).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析芎姜複方不同提取部位的縮宮作用。

sentences.english: Compond Erythromycin Alcohol Solution Set in the Content Side Crythyomycin.
sentences.chinese: 測定複方紅黴素醇溶液中紅黴素含量。

sentences.english: To the compound anisodine injection as the control group.
sentences.chinese: 以單純複方樟柳鹼穴位注射治療作爲對照組。

sentences.english: Clinical observation on curative effect of compound areca gargle on dental plaque and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 複方檳榔含漱液對控制菌斑和消除牙齦炎療效觀察。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare the combined rivanol paste and observe its clinical effect.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備複方利凡諾糊劑，觀察臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Conclusion The tolerance of compound nitrendipine is good in healthy volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 結論健康志願者對複方尼羣地平片能較好耐受。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of "Fufang Daihuang Lotion" in the treatment of mixed hemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方大黃湯薰洗治療混合痔的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Conclusion The reform of the prescription of the compound Hai Tong Pi bag is successful.
sentences.chinese: 結論複方海桐皮袋泡劑的劑型改革是成功的。

sentences.english: Objective The technology of the optimal extraction for Compound Gema granules was investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選複方葛麻顆粒最佳提取工藝。

definition: delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
